Description.p: A code indicating what kind of information this CompoundStatement contains. It affects the vocabulary applicable to the EhrCompoundCode of the same CompoundStatement , q.v.

concept.displayName: Topic A subdivision of a composition related to a particular clinical issue (such as a problem)
Category A subdivision of a Composition or Topic containing similar elements (e.g. Subjective, Objective, Assessment, Plan)
Cluster A subdivision of a Composition, Topic or Category containing closely related Statements and / or Batteries
Battery A subdivision of Composition, Topic, Category or Cluster containing Statements that comprise the observations from an identifiable investigation.
